news.title: Moody's may cut ratings of six US banks over commercial real estate exposure
news.para: The long-term ratings of First Merchants Corp, F.N.B. Corp, Fulton Financial Corp, Old National Bancorp, Peapack-Gladstone Financial Corp and WaFd were placed on review.

news.title: House prices in UK drop by 0.1% in May: Halifax
news.para: In the 12 months to May, prices rose by 1.5%, Halifax said on Friday, faster than the median forecast in the Reuters poll for an annual increase of 1.2%.

news.title: US: Mortgage rates ease, pulling average rate on 30-year home loan to below 7%
news.para: Borrowing costs on 15-year fixed-rate mortgages, popular with homeowners refinancing their home loans, also eased this week, lowering the average rate to 6.29% from 6.36% last week. A year ago, it averaged 6.07%, Freddie Mac said.

news.title: Six civic bodies likely to debut on bond street by July 2024
news.para: Nashik, Visakhapatnam, Kanpur, Surat, Varanasi, and Prayagraj are likely to issue municipal bonds by July with a fundraise of Rs 100-300 crore at 7.9-8.3% coupon rate. Municipal bodies have raised nearly Rs 3,000 crore from the bond market in last seven years

news.title: Gopalan Enterprises targets Rs 500 crore rental income over next  four-five years
news.para: Real estate developer, Gopalan Enterprises, part of Gopalan Group, aims to increase its office rental income to Rs 500 crore annually and could list its assets as a real estate investment trust (REIT) in the next four-five years, a senior company executive said.

news.title: RBI keeps repo rate unchanged at 6.5%
news.para: Announcing the second bi-monthly monetary policy for the current financial year, RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das said the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) has decided to keep the repo rate unchanged at 6.5 per cent.

news.title: Goa's chief town planner can now change regional plan, ODPs
news.para: The new rules mean that the department can change the classification of a plot of land based on the directions of govt or applications from individuals.

news.title: NCLT dismisses Surya Landmark Developers' intervention plea at pre-admission stage
news.para: The National Company Law Tribunal dismissed an intervention petition by Surya Landmark Developers regarding exclusion of its prime 0.5-acre land parcel in Mumbai's Lower Parel from insolvency proceedings initiated by ACRE.

news.title: Jaiprakash Associates creditors pick IBC over NARCL's Rs 10,000 crore offer
news.para: Lenders plan insolvency route for debt-laden Jaypee, delaying debt sale to NARCL. Jaypee owes Rs 30,000 crore to 32 creditors, including ICICI Bank, and was admitted to NCLT recently after a six-year delay.

news.title: Unsold housing stock up 24% in top seven cities: Report
news.para: Despite this surge in unsold inventory, the consultant noted that there has been a remarkable reduction in the estimated time required to sell these properties.

news.title: IBBI issues new guidelines to streamline process of appointing IPs as resolution professionals
news.para: The Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI) issues new guidelines to streamline the appointment of insolvency professionals (IPs) as interim resolution professionals, liquidators, and bankruptcy trustees, effective from July 1, 2024.

news.title: Noida authority orders asset attachment of Aims Max Gardenia over Rs 2,409 crore dues
news.para: The Noida Authority has ordered the attachment of properties of realty group Aims Max Gardenia (AMG) over pending dues of Rs 2,409.77 crore against two land allotments in the city.

news.title: Bajaj Housing Finance approves IPO to raise Rs 40 billion
news.para: Bajaj Housing Finance, a unit of non-banking finance company (NBFC) Bajaj Finance, said the IPO would include a sale of shares by existing shareholders.

news.title: Hotel executives set sights on empty office buildings as supply lags demand
news.para: Hotel supply growth in 2024 is hovering under 1% compared to 30-year averages of 2.5%, but with commercial assets sitting empty around the world, hotel operators are scouting unique conversion opportunities.

news.title: Country Garden's Hong Kong liquidation hearing further adjourned to July
news.para: The company did not provide a reason for the delay. The hearing was originally adjourned to June 11 from May, as Country Garden had requested more time to prepare evidence.

news.title: Delhi court grants bail to Supertech's chairman in money laundering case
news.para: As many as 26 FIRs were registered by the EOW, Delhi Police, Haryana Police and Uttar Pradesh Police against Supertech and its group companies, and Arora, for criminal conspiracy, cheating and criminal breach for allegedly cheating at least 670 home buyers for an amount of Rs 164 crore.

news.title: Delhi civic body to stop accepting cheques for property tax payment from July 1
news.para: ​Starting next month, property tax will have to be paid digitally through UPI, wallets, demand draft, pay order or through any online payment gateway, the civic body said in a statement.

news.title: Draft rules to charge encroachers: Delhi high court
news.para: Justice Rajnish Bhatnagar in a recent order noted that in case of encroachment, the encroacher must be made liable by the land-owning authorities concerned to the extent of the illegal encroachment done.

news.title: Residents of 14 buildings in Pune's Ambegaon Budruk evacuated after landslip amid rain
news.para: The Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) officials served notice to residents late on Tuesday night after boulders came crashing down in Viva Nirman Society in Ambegaon Budruk.

news.title: Suraksha Group to infuse Rs 3,000 crore to construct Jaypee Wish Town project
news.para: Suraksha Group has committed to completing and delivering homes to buyers within 3 to 3.5 years in a phased manner. The company will infuse a working capital line of Rs 3,000 crore to ensure uninterrupted construction activities.
